arts.ttl: Play-off hopefuls Exeter and Lincoln fail to find a breakthrough
arts.sum: The League One clash in Devon finished goalless.

arts.ttl: Exeter City players urged to grab chance from international call-ups
arts.sum: Josh Magennis, Ilmari Niskanen and Kamari Doyle have been called up by Northern Ireland, Finland and England Under-20s respectively. You never know when your opportunities come into play and that’s why we demand every day that people train at the right intensity, with the right focus, so that when called upon, they are ready.”

arts.ttl: Exeter City Women look to bounce back after defeat
arts.sum: Favour Omenazu completes the Dons early summer recruitment, Omenazu playing a role in Stourbridge’s successful survival battle in the Northern Premier last season. Twenty-eight players from last season’s squad are no longer with the team, with the new look Dons having moved quickly to recruit ahead of this campaign.

arts.ttl: Exeter City hope 'fiasco' over international call-ups will lead to change
arts.sum: “I think, knowing the fixtures at the start of the season would be a huge help to everyone and, like I said, with the quality and the number of internationals every team has now, I think it should be similar to the Championship and we have those dates called off.” “We’ve said what we need to say, I’m sure the EFL will look into it and hopefully they come to a decision that it’s not just this club, every club would be in the same boat, I think every manager would be in the same boat where, it’s not just the games, but it’s the preparing training, when it’s on or it’s off.

arts.ttl: Preview: Exeter City vs. Lincoln City - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Exeter City and Lincoln City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Exeter are bang in the middle of the League One table following just one victory from their last three matches. The Grecians have won four of their six home games, including against Charlton last tim...
